duties_responsibilities.duty: Cultivates and maintains professional and proactive communication level with clients, production staff, and other associates.
Manages, leads, and develops direct reports, including Account Executives, and has ultimate responsibility of service teams within a specified industry.

Monitors and coordinates: training and development of all service team members, assigns new accounts and transfers of accounts among staff to maintain workable workloads, ensures quality control standards of the team are continually maintained.
Develops marketing strategy for new and renewal business and prepares, submits, and negotiates new and renewal marketing to insurance carriers.
Develops a service plan tailored to client’s needs and coordinates the services of other departments.
Prepares and leads internal and client-facing business reviews to ensure level of service and adequacy of client’s program design based on their business needs and risk tolerance.
Participates in industry-specific associations and networking events to cultivate relationships within the industry and expand the brand.
Supports the department by participating in completion of all duties required to complete a project and service a client.
Serves as a leadership champion of organizational initiatives.
Communicates with market president regarding department strategies, needs, and performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred or equivalent experience.
